data.title: Perret Office Space on 44 Avenue Georges Pompidou
data.meta_description: Levallois-Perret office space is now available in this business centre at 44 Avenue Georges Pompidou. Call us on +44 20 3998 2883 about serviced offices in Levallois-Perret and other prime business locations in France.
data.text:
This centre is housed in a newly renovated modern building in the business district of Levallois, which will give your company a strategic presence straight off the bat. Both private offices and co-working spaces are available and the Eiffel Tower can be viewed from the space. The centre boasts high speed internet, furniture, meeting rooms, printers, cleaning and maintenance of the premises, and breakout areas with Nespresso machines. Parking and VOIP phones are optional. The offices can come fully furnished with internet included in its fantastic pricing. Duration is flexible with no hidden fees.

About this Location

This centre is located in the middle of the business district of Levallois-Perret, surrounded by a subtle blend of modern and traditional buildings. It is an outstanding environment that encourages innovation and offers a pleasant and dynamic work environment for everyone. Local amenities, such as restaurants, are within reach, where you can spend well deserved lunch breaks, convene business meals and keep clients entertained. There is also a post office and supermarket next door, as well as several hotels.
